Plot: To protect a beautiful woman (Nia Long) and her son (Jascha Washington) from a robber (Terrence Howard), a male FBI agent (Martin Lawrence) disguises as a large grandmother.
Title: Big Momma's House
Writer: Darryl Quarles (story), Darryl Quarles (screenplay), Don Rhymer (screenplay)
Actors: Martin Lawrence, Nia Long, Paul Giamatti, Jascha Washington
tomatoConsensus: Big Momma's House is funny in some parts, but it is essentially a one-joke movie.
